name: Gouki Tochi
description:
I LOVE STREET FIGHTER!

I have no intentions in selling this game as my own content.

Although I created this game with several noob friendly tutorials, I know a lot of my material is borrowed from Capcom. Capcom owns the character sprites I have chosen to use to showcase the potential of my project and the music/sounds were also from Street Fighter II to the most recent Street Fighter V. 

Thanks for checking my game out and I hope you enjoyed!

(If received well by the public, I shall continue to make more levels and explore more innovating ways to challenge the players!)
